## R Markdown

```{r brain-vol}
calc_prop_vol <- function(ms) {
  last_row <- nrow(ms)

  all_brain <- ms %>% 
    select(volume_mm3) %>% 
    slice(2:last_row)

  vol <- sum(all_brain)
  
  hip_vol <- ms %>% 
    filter(ROI == 52) %>% 
    select(volume_mm3)  
  
  prop_hip <- hip_vol/vol
}
```
